{{also|saft|SAFT}} {{wikipedia|lang=de}} ==German== ===Etymology=== From {{inh|de|gmh|saf}}, {{m|gmh|saft}}, from {{inh|de|goh|saf}}, from {{inh|de|gem-pro|*sapą||juice, sap}}, from
